mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_platform_bookcube ( product_name, author, brand, sales_category, sales_type, episode, net_price, sale_price, discount, fee, net_target_price, deduction_reserves_event, payment, book_id, isbn, e_isbn, e_isbn_epub, writer_id, set_date ) VALUES ( #{productName}, #{author}, #{brand}, #{salesCategory}, #{salesType}, #{episode}, #{netPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{discount}, #{fee}, #{netTargetPrice}, #{deductionReservesEvent}, #{payment}, #{bookId}, #{isbn}, #{eIsbn}, #{eIsbnEpub}, #{writerId}, #{setDate} )

INSERT INTO tb_platform_joara ( brand, product_name, product_code, author, unit, sale_amount, ratio, payment, payment_date, writer_id, set_date ) VALUES ( #{brand}, #{productName}, #{productCode}, #{author}, #{unit}, #{saleAmount}, #{ratio}, #{payment}, #{paymentDate}, #{writerId}, #{setDate} )

INSERT INTO tb_platform_kakao ( brand, special_general_2, entrepreneur, entrepreneur_id, publisher, contract_uid, contract_category, contract, new_contract, category, series_id, product_name, product_code, lable, author, is_isbn, cp_settlement_rate_android, cp_settlement_rate_ios, use_ticket_type, use_ticket_amount, cache_sum, cpp_1, cpl_1, cp1_1, cp2_1, cp3_1, cp7_1, cp8_1, cp9_1, event_cache_1, original_sum, cpp_2, cpl_2, cp1_2, cp2_2, cp3_2, cp7_2, cp8_2, cp9_2, event_cache_2, value_supply, tax_amount, payment, writer_id, set_date ) VALUES ( #{brand}, #{specialGeneral2}, #{entrepreneur}, #{entrepreneurId}, #{publisher}, #{contractUid}, #{contractCategory}, #{contract}, #{newContract}, #{category}, #{seriesId}, #{productName}, #{productCode}, #{lable}, #{author}, #{isIsbn}, #{cpSettlementRateAndroid}, #{cpSettlementRateIos}, #{useTicketType}, #{useTicketAmount}, #{cacheSum}, #{cpp1}, #{cpl1}, #{cp1_1}, #{cp2_1}, #{cp3_1}, #{cp7_1}, #{cp8_1}, #{cp9_1}, #{eventCache1}, #{originalSum}, #{cpp2}, #{cpl2}, #{cp1_2}, #{cp2_2}, #{cp3_2}, #{cp7_2}, #{cp8_2}, #{cp9_2}, #{eventCache2}, #{valueSupply}, #{taxAmount}, #{payment}, #{writerId}, #{setDate} )

INSERT INTO tb_platform_kyobo ( brand, sales_category, sales_type, product, main_section, book_barcode, isbn, epub_isbn, pdf_isbn, product_name, episode, author, net_price, sale_price, sale_rate, download, net_target_price, net_target_price_amount, payment, accounting_rates, book_number, writer_id, set_date ) VALUES ( #{brand}, #{salesCategory}, #{salesType}, #{product}, #{mainSection}, #{bookBarcode}, #{isbn}, #{epubIsbn}, #{pdfIsbn}, #{productName}, #{episode}, #{author}, #{netPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{saleRate}, #{download}, #{netTargetPrice}, #{netTargetPriceAmount}, #{payment}, #{accountingRates}, #{bookNumber}, #{writerId}, #{setDate} )

INSERT INTO tb_platform_mrblue ( brand, date, product_name, author, code, fixed_num, fixed_sales, fixed_payment, a_app_onerental_num, a_app_onerental_use, a_app_onerental_payment, a_app_onemngr_num, a_app_onemngr_use, a_app_onemngr_payment, a_app_allrental_num, a_app_allrental_use, a_app_allrental_payment, a_app_allmngr_num, a_app_allmngr_use, a_app_allmngr_payment, i_app_onerental_num, i_app_onerental_use, i_app_onerental_payment, i_app_onemngr_num, i_app_onemngr_use, i_app_onemngr_payment, i_app_allrental_num, i_app_allrental_use, i_app_allrental_payment, i_app_allmngr_num, i_app_allmngr_use, i_app_allmngr_payment, amount_num, amount_use, amount_payment, amount_settlement, sales, payment, writer_id, set_date ) VALUES ( #{brand}, #{date}, #{productName}, #{author}, #{code}, #{fixedNum}, #{fixedSales}, #{fixedPayment}, #{aAppOnerentalNum}, #{aAppOnerentalUse}, #{aAppOnerentalPayment}, #{aAppOnemngrNum}, #{aAppOnemngrUse}, #{aAppOnemngrPayment}, #{aAppAllrentalNum}, #{aAppAllrentalUse}, #{aAppAllrentalPayment}, #{aAppAllmngrNum}, #{aAppAllmngrUse}, #{aAppAllmngrPayment}, #{iAppOnerentalNum}, #{iAppOnerentalUse}, #{iAppOnerentalPayment}, #{iAppOnemngrNum}, #{iAppOnemngrUse}, #{iAppOnemngrPayment}, #{iAppAllrentalNum}, #{iAppAllrentalUse}, #{iAppAllrentalPayment}, #{iAppAllmngrNum}, #{iAppAllmngrUse}, #{iAppAllmngrPayment}, #{amountNum}, #{amountUse}, #{amountPayment}, #{amountSettlement}, #{sales}, #{payment}, #{writerId}, #{setDate} )

INSERT INTO tb_platform_ridibooks ( series_id, book_id, product_name, episode, author, translators, picture, brand, series_name, ebooks_price, single_sale_sales, single_sale_ticket, single_free_ticket, rental_amount, rental_ticket, free_down_amount, free_down_ticket, set_sale_amount, set_sale_ticket, set_rental_amount, set_rental_ticket, cancel_amount, cancel_ticket, cancel_single_sale_sales, cancel_single_sale_ticket, cancel_rental_amount, cancel_rental_ticket, cancel_free_down_amount, cancel_free_down_ticket, cancel_set_sale_amount, cancel_set_sale_ticket, cancel_set_rental_amount, cancel_set_rental_ticket, payment, paperbook_isbn10, paperbook_isbn13, ebook_isbn10, ebook_isbn13, cp_manage_id, category_1, category_2, writer_id, set_date ) VALUES ( #{seriesId}, #{bookId}, #{productName}, #{episode}, #{author}, #{translators}, #{picture}, #{brand}, #{seriesName}, #{ebooksPrice}, #{singleSaleSales}, #{singleSaleTicket}, #{singleFreeTicket}, #{rentalAmount}, #{rentalTicket}, #{freeDownAmount}, #{freeDownTicket}, #{setSaleAmount}, #{setSaleTicket}, #{setRentalAmount}, #{setRentalTicket}, #{cancelAmount}, #{cancelTicket}, #{cancelSingleSaleSales}, #{cancelSingleSaleTicket}, #{cancelRentalAmount}, #{cancelRentalTicket}, #{cancelFreeDownAmount}, #{cancelFreeDownTicket}, #{cancelSetSaleAmount}, #{cancelSetSaleTicket}, #{cancelSetRentalAmount}, #{cancelSetRentalTicket}, #{payment}, #{paperbookIsbn10}, #{paperbookIsbn13}, #{ebookIsbn10}, #{ebookIsbn13}, #{cpManageId}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{writerId}, #{setDate} )

INSERT INTO tb_platform_winstore ( partner_name, partner_id, entrepreneur, channel_product_id, channel_product_name, product_name, episode, product_id, second_settlement_status, category, brand, author, picture_author, type, sale_rate, cencel_rate, settlement_target_amount, sales_rate, sales_amount, cencels_rate, cencels_amount, sum, customer_payment, customer_payment_receipt, customer_payment_etc, customer_payment_service, customer_payment_service_etc, service_deduction, payment, payment_type, writer_id, set_date ) VALUES ( #{partnerName}, #{partnerId}, #{entrepreneur}, #{channelProductId}, #{channelProductName}, #{productName}, #{episode}, #{productId}, #{secondSettlementStatus}, #{category}, #{brand}, #{author}, #{pictureAuthor}, #{type}, #{saleRate}, #{cencelRate}, #{settlementTargetAmount}, #{salesRate}, #{salesAmount}, #{cencelsRate}, #{cencelsAmount}, #{sum}, #{customerPayment}, #{customerPaymentReceipt}, #{customerPaymentEtc}, #{customerPaymentService}, #{customerPaymentServiceEtc}, #{serviceDeduction}, #{payment}, #{paymentType}, #{writerId}, #{setDate} )

INSERT INTO tb_platform_yes24 ( no, product_name, brand, brand_sale_price, sales, sales_sale_price, sales_refund_price, cost_rate, payment, event_type, sale_type, event_sale_price, author, epubl_id, set_code, paperbook_isbn, ebook_isbn, sale_date, refund_date, writer_id, set_date ) VALUES ( #{no}, #{productName}, #{brand}, #{brandSalePrice}, #{sales}, #{salesSalePrice}, #{salesRefundPrice}, #{costRate}, #{payment}, #{eventType}, #{saleType}, #{eventSalePrice}, #{author}, #{epublId}, #{setCode}, #{paperbookIsbn}, #{ebookIsbn}, #{saleDate}, #{refundDate}, #{writerId}, #{setDate} )
